name: Functor that Preserves Colimits
definition: A **Functor** $F:C\to D$ **preserves colimits** if for every diagram $D:I\to C$, the canonical map $F(\operatorname{colim} D) \to \operatorname{colim} F(D)$ is an isomorphism.
description: A #functor preserves colimits if it commutes with the formation of colimits.
